title: Am I In An Open Relationship
itunes:title: Am I In An Open Relationship
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a 36 year old married woman and my husband just turned 40 so we went on a weekend getaway to Las Vegas with another married couple that we have known for years. We got to our hotel suite and we were drinking and eating and having a good time, just the 4 of us. The guys went down to the bar around 11pm for a nightcap. I was so tipsy and tired, that I decided to lie across my bed until my husband came back. I woke up around 3am and my husband was not in the bed.................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
